bugs.title: CVE-2022-0408 vim: Stack-based Buffer Overflow in spellsuggest.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-0408 vim: Stack-based Buffer Overflow in spellsuggest.c

long_desc.thetext:
Stack-based Buffer Overflow in Conda vim prior to 8.2.

https://huntr.dev/bounties/5e635bad-5cf6-46cd-aeac-34ef224e179d
https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/06f15416bb8d5636200a10776f1752c4d6e49f31

Created vim tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2048516]

Marking Services affected/delegated/low for presence of affected code.

In the vast majority of cases, the relevant package exists in a container image consumed by the service.
Recommend updating or replacing the container image (to update or remove the package) as appropriate.

bugs.title: CVE-2022-0413 vim: Use after free in src/ex_cmds.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-0413 vim: Use after free in src/ex_cmds.c

long_desc.thetext:
Use After Free in Conda vim prior to 8.2.

https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/37f47958b8a2a44abc60614271d9537e7f14e51a
https://huntr.dev/bounties/563d1e8f-5c3d-4669-941c-3216f4a87c38

Created vim tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2048520]

Marking Services affected/delegated/low for presence of affected code.

In the vast majority of cases, the relevant package exists in a container image consumed by the service.
Recommend updating or replacing the container image (to update or remove the package) as appropriate.

This issue has been addressed in the following products:

  Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8

Via RHSA-2022:0894 https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2022:0894

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2022-0413
